CHAN PHAM
Date of birth: 12/10/1991
Phone: 
+Email: 
Address: Tp Ho Chi Minh, 
Vietnam
PERSONAL HIGHLIGHT SKILLS
A young manager with soft-skills and Customer Service skill with high standard experiences in 5 stars services
were equiped from years by years. Can-do attitude and strongly passion when working. Critical thinking and
analytical are skills which were received compliments from line-managers and colleagues during working time
before.
EDUCATION
Hutech University
Oct 2009 - May 2013
Major: Business Administration
WORK EXPERIENCE
Colliers International - Business Development Manager
 2017 - Present
Properties Manager/ Develop Properties
Main responsibilities:
- Managing, coordinating and planing essential central services: reception, security, maintenance, mail,
cleaning, catering...
- Maintains property by investigating and resolving tenant complaints, enforcing rules of occupancy
- Training soft skills, supervise and motivate staffs working with excellent in guest service
- Building SOP & Cost Plan for estates
- Join networking to create and build business for Properties & Asset Services
- Meeting with client and present methods/ solutions to client
Recognition and Gains:
- Expert in customer services provingding
- Well cooperate with Developer and contractor to completely setup facilities for resident's convenience
- Dealing cost/ issues with suppliers/ sub-contractors
- Presentation with highly skills, convince and persuation
British Consulate General
 2015 - 2017
Operations Manager
- Manage supplier/ vendor for securities/ cleaning/ maintainance plan anually
- Make sure whole maintenance work adapt with Health & Safety of UK's standard
- Report to Regional Manager  about contracts and operations status
Achievements and skills gained: 
- Create structures for operations system and apply as standard until presents
- Completely contributing for the best working places for whole staff
Imperia An Phu - Luxury Apartment
 2013 - 2015
Receptionist - Assistant Operation Manager
- Resolves service problems by clarifying resident's complaint
- Conduct shift briefing to ensure apartment's activities and operations requirement are known
- Report to Operation Manager  about apartment's activities and defects besides resident's feedback
Achievements and skills gained: 
- Contributed into the developing of Imperia An Phu was voted for "the most liveable apartment" in 2014
- Save 60% decoration's fee for management to organize events
ACTIVITIES
M.I.K Corporation - PROJECT PRESENTATOR
April 2015
Member of  M.I.K Group
- Present a new project with more over 100 businessmans to negotiateand persuade them invest to our project
- Ability in public speaking skill and presentation
SKILLS
Language
English Intermediate
Computer
Word, Excel, Powerpoint
Soft skills
Communicate, negotiate and presentation, Feng-shui
REFERENCES
Vi Hai Au
Director of  Alpha King Real Estate Development JSC
Mobile: 0908 179 877
© topcv.vn
